meanings.definition: Of extremely high quality or superior grade.
meanings.sent1: The superpremium chocolate melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The superpremium car was the fastest on the track.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a superpremium chef when I cooked dinner for my friends.
meanings.sent4: Her superpremium skills in painting left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The superpremium fabric was so soft that it felt like a cloud.

meanings.definition: A product or service of superior quality or higher price.
meanings.sent1: The bakery sold superpremium cakes for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: I splurged on a superpremium watch for my anniversary.
meanings.sent3: The superpremium ice cream was so expensive, it better taste like gold!
meanings.sent4: Investing in superpremium stocks can lead to higher returns.
meanings.sent5: The superpremium vacation package included a private island getaway.
